TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit NameScopePropertyAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class NameScopePropertyAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class NameScopePropertyAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定提供 XAML 名称范围值的关联类的属性。

span.span: Specifies a property of the associated class that provides the XAML namescope value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 典型对象模型中使用 XAML 的位置，应用程序模型组合用作 XAML 名称范围的类可作为根元素，通常使用或支持页面比喻的类。In a typical object model / application model combination where XAML is used, the classes that are used as a XAML namescope are the classes that are generally used as root elements, or that support a page metaphor. 通常，这些类实现，XAML 名称范围是否创建对应于根目录的框架的编程模型和应用程序模型的上下文中的典型 XAML 处理行为。These classes generally implement and the XAML namescope is created corresponding to the root by typical XAML processing behavior in context of a framework's programming model and application model. 如果是使用，XAML 名称范围的属性值应为实现的对象和保存的实际的 XAML 名称范围及其行为。If is used, the XAML namescope property value is expected to be an object that implements and holds the actual XAML namescope and its behavior. 有此特性的两种形式： 仅，属性名称或类型和属性。There are two forms for this attribute: property name only, or type and property. 后一种形式应仅用于其中包含 XAML 名称范围的属性是可附加成员的情况。The latter form should be used only for cases where the property that holds the XAML name scope is an attachable member. 附加的成员方法的优点服务类可实现可以支持几种不同的对象类型的 XAML 名称范围概念。The attached member technique has the advantage that service classes can implement a XAML namescope concept that can support several different object types. 这些对象类型然后并不需要显式相关在类继承。Those object types then do not need to be explicitly related in class inheritance. 在以前版本的.NET Framework 中，此类特定于 WPF 程序集 WindowsBase 中存在。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，位于 System.Xaml 程序集中。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 有关详细信息，请参阅[类型从 WPF 迁移到 System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md). ## WPF 用法说明WPF Usage Notes 在 WPF 中，此属性应用于仅单个类型。In WPF, this attribute is applied to only a single type, . 特性化的属性在此情况下为服务类及其附加属性。In this case the attributed property is the service class and its attached property.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

param.name: name
param.span: 提供 XAML 名称范围的特性化类型上属性的名称。

span.span: The name of the property on the attributed type that provides the XAML namescope.

summary.span: 用指定的名称初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name.

param.name: name
param.span: 提供 XAML 名称范围的可附加成员的名称。

span.span: The name of the attachable member that provides the XAML name scope.

param.name: type
param.span: 提供 XAML 名称范围的可附加成员的所有者类型。

span.span: The owner type of the attachable member that provides the XAML name scope.

summary.span: 使用指定的名称和类型初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name and type.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取提供 XAML 命名空间的属性的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the property that provides the XAML namescope.

value.span: 一个字符串值，该值是提供 XAML 命名空间的属性的名称。

span.span: A string value that is the name of the property that provides the XAML namescope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 含义取决于是否设置。The meaning of depends on whether is set. 如果为 null，则引用正在属性化类型上的属性。If is null, then references a property on the type being attributed. 如果包含一个值，则引用上指示的属性。If contains a value, then references a property on the indicated .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Type As Type
public: property Type ^ Type { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取提供 XAML 命名空间支持的附加属性的所有者类型。

span.span: Gets the owner type of the attached property that provides the XAML namescope support.

value.span: 一个 值，该值是提供 XAML 命名空间支持的所附加属性的所有者类型；或者为 。

span.span: A value that is the owner type of the attached property that provides the XAML namescope support, or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性仅是相关的 XAML 名称范围实现属性是否可附加成员，这种情况下这是可附加成员的所有者类型。This property only is relevant if the XAML namescope implementing property is an attachable member, in which case this is the attachable member's owner type. 否则，此值可能为 null。Otherwise, this value may be null. 如果你需要报告名称空间属性的类型定义在所有情况下，基于反射的常规逻辑，则你可以替换时你会遇到用应用了该属性的类型`null`此属性。If you need general reflection-based logic that reports a namescope property's defining type in all cases, then you can substitute the type where the attribute is applied whenever you encounter `null` for this property.
